statements: SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_products;
SELECT product_name, price FROM pharmaceutical_products;
SELECT product_name, price FROM pharmaceutical_products WHERE price < 50;
SELECT product_name, manufacturer FROM pharmaceutical_products ORDER BY manufacturer ASC;
SELECT product_name, price, manufacturer FROM pharmaceutical_products WHERE competitor_id IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_products ORDER BY product_name DESC, price ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM pharmaceutical_products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_name, manufacturer FROM pharmaceutical_products WHERE competitor_id IS NULL;
SELECT manufacturer, COUNT(*) AS total_products FROM pharmaceutical_products GROUP BY manufacturer HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY total_products DESC;
SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_products WHERE manufacturer LIKE '%pharmaceutical' ORDER BY product_id ASC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM Pharmaceutical_Products WHERE price < 50.00
SELECT product_name, price, competitor_name FROM Pharmaceutical_Products WHERE competitor_name = 'XYZ Pharma'
SELECT * FROM Pharmaceutical_Products ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT product_name, price FROM Pharmaceutical_Products WHERE product_name LIKE '%Aspirin%'
SELECT analysis_date, market_trend FROM Market_Analysis WHERE analysis_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT product_name, price FROM Pharmaceutical_Products WHERE competitor_name = 'XYZ Pharmaceuticals';
SELECT * FROM Market_Analysis WHERE analysis_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY market_trend DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Pharmaceutical_Products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT analysis_id, recommendation FROM Market_Analysis WHERE recommendation IS NOT NULL;
SELECT SUM(price) AS total_price FROM Pharmaceutical_Products;
SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_products;
SELECT id, name, price FROM pharmaceutical_products;
SELECT name, manufacturer, market_research FROM pharmaceutical_products;
SELECT * FROM competitor_analysis;
SELECT competitor_name, competitor_product FROM competitor_analysis;
SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, name, price FROM pharmaceutical_products WHERE manufacturer = 'Pfizer' AND market_research = 'Positive';
SELECT competitor_name, competitor_product, pricing_strategy FROM competitor_analysis WHERE competitor_name LIKE 'G%' ORDER BY competitor_name DESC;

SELECT p.name, c.competitor_product, ps.strategy_description FROM pharmaceutical_products p JOIN competitor_analysis c ON p.id = c.id JOIN pricing_strategy ps ON p.id = ps.product_id WHERE ps.pricing_tier = 2;
SELECT p.name AS product_name, c.competitor_name AS competitor, c.pricing_strategy AS competitor_strategy FROM pharmaceutical_products p, competitor_analysis c WHERE p.id = c.id AND p.price >= 100;
SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_products;
SELECT product_name, price FROM pharmaceutical_products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_name, description FROM pharmaceutical_products WHERE price < 50;
SELECT * FROM market_research_data WHERE research_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY research_date DESC;
SELECT competitor_name, market_share FROM competitor_analysis WHERE market_share > 0.2 ORDER BY market_share DESC;
SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_products;
SELECT product_name, price FROM pharmaceutical_products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_name, description FROM pharmaceutical_products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT research_id, research_date, research_details FROM market_research_data WHERE research_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT analysis_id, competitor_name, market_share FROM competitor_analysis WHERE market_share > 0.2 ORDER BY market_share DESC;
SELECT * FROM drug_products;
SELECT name, price FROM drug_products WHERE manufacturer = 'Pfizer';
SELECT id, description FROM drug_products WHERE price > 100;
SELECT manufacturer, name, price FROM drug_products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales_history WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM drug_products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT manufacturer, COUNT(id) AS total_products FROM drug_products GROUP BY manufacturer HAVING COUNT(id) > 2;
SELECT details->'researcher' AS researcher, findings FROM market_research WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT company_name, products_sold, (market_share * 100) AS market_share_percentage FROM competitor_analysis ORDER BY market_share DESC, products_sold ASC;
SELECT id, strategy_name, pricing_model FROM pricing_strategy WHERE target_market = 'Pharmaceuticals' AND strategy_name LIKE '%Pricing%';
